item.title: Trump-backed nationalist clinches Poland's presidency
item.description: Eurosceptic Nawrocki's win can deliver considerable setbacks to former European Council President Tusk's pro-EU government.

item.title: PBS sues Trump over executive order to cut funding
item.description: PBS sued President Donald Trump to block his effort to cut off federal funding for the public broadcaster.
